page.title: 14ORKNEY FOOD
page.content: In Orkney we have our{breakfast around 8.00 to 8.30.We did a survey and found that most people ate cereal,toast and coffee for breakfast. We have our{dinner}at around 1.00 pm. A typical meal would be meat(mince is popular)or fish with potatoes and a vegetable. { Tea}is a lighter meal and often includes floury bannocks,bere bannocks oat cakes,bread and cakes.Tea is the usual drink. { Suppertime}varies. Orkney has many{local specialities such as : mealie pudding, clapshot, spoots(razorshells), crab, lobster, fudge, butter and cheese.Orkney is famous for its beef.
